minerinfo.total_hash: tail -100 ${NVOC}/nvoc_logs/screenlog.0 | grep Speed | sed -r 's/\x1B\[([0-9]{1,2}(;[0-9]{1,2})?)?[m|K]//g' | grep -o '[0-9]*.[0-9]* Mh/s' | awk '{print$1}' | awk '{s+=$1} END {printf "%.0f", s}'
minerinfo.hash_count: tail -100 ${NVOC}/nvoc_logs/screenlog.0 | grep Speed | grep -v grep | wc -l | awk '{print $1}'
